steps_to_reproduce: See dotnet list package output; package Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Core 1.68.0 referenced in Saas.Web/Saas.Web.csproj
impact: Potential remote code execution or other critical impact depending on advisory
recommendation: Upgrade or patch Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Core to a non-vulnerable version; if no fix available, isolate usage and apply compensating controls
